maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayacallbacks/liveinstance.cpp

#include "mayacallbacks/liveinstance.h"

#include "liveasyncjob.h"
#include "scenemanager.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

        void LiveInstance::onAttributeChanged(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2) {
                MStatus res;
                MFnMesh m(m_o, &res);

                std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug1);

                if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        if (msg & MNodeMessage::kConnectionMade) {
                                if (plugName == L"instObjGroups") {
                                        // Material changed, trigger mesh update
                                        m_sm.getLiveResourceManager().postUpdate(m_o);
                                }
                        }
                        if (msg & MNodeMessage::kAttributeSet) {
                                if (plugName == L"castsShadows") {
                                        bool castsShadows = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"castsShadows", castsShadows);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_CAST_SHADOWS, castsShadows);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"receiveShadows") {
                                        bool receiveShadows = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"receiveShadows", receiveShadows);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_RECEIVE_SHADOWS, receiveShadows);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"primaryVisibility" || plugName == L"visibility") {
                                        bool primaryVisibility = true;
                                        bool visibility = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"primaryVisibility", primaryVisibility);
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"visibility", visibility);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_EYE, primaryVisibility && visibility);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"visibleInReflections") {
                                        bool visibleInReflections = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"visibleInReflections", visibleInReflections);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_REFLECTIONS, visibleInReflections);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"visibleInRefractions") {
                                        bool visibleInRefractions = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"visibleInRefractions", visibleInRefractions);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_REFRACTIONS, visibleInRefractions);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"doubleSided") {
                                        bool doubleSided = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"doubleSided", doubleSided);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_DOUBLE_SIDED, doubleSided);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"opposite") {
                                        bool opposite = false;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"opposite", opposite);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_OPPOSITE, opposite);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"beastVisibleForGI") {
                                        bool beastVisibleForGI = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"beastVisibleForGI", beastVisibleForGI);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_VISIBLE_FOR_GI, beastVisibleForGI);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"beastCastGI") {
                                        bool beastCastGI = true;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"beastCastGI", beastCastGI);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_CAST_GI, beastCastGI);
                                }
                                else if (plugName == L"beastShadowBias") {
                                        bool beastShadowBias = false;
                                        getPlugValue(m, L"beastShadowBias", beastShadowBias);
                                        m_instance->setRenderStats(ILB_RS_SHADOW_BIAS, beastShadowBias);
                                }
                        }
                }
        }

        LiveInstance::LiveInstance(const MObject& object, const BeastInstancePtr& i, SceneManager& sm) :
        NodeMessageObject(object), m_instance(i), m_sm(sm)
        {
        }
}
